views.markdown:
[Statusbar] Support multiline and font size for iPhone X. Basic support for iOS 11. Fixed
- [Shortcuts] Crash when invoke dismiss button force touch shortcut on NotificationCenter.
- [Preference] ThirdParty Apps could not hide after relaunch.


New
- Support iOS 10.0-10.2.
- [Statusbar] "NW" special format.
- [Statusbar] Add "BTHeadphones" and "LiquidDetection" options.

Mod
- [Menu, Statusbar] dynamic icon loading for preference.
- [ControlCenter] Remove feature in iOS 10.
- [NotificationCenter] Remove feature in iOS 10.

Fix
- [Preference] missing icon loading.

- [Preference] iCloud cell add to safelist on iOS 9.1+ to avoid crash when launch Preference.app.

- Fixed fail to load PreferenceBundle on iOS < 9.0.

New
- [All] Support iOS 9.3.
- [Activity] Add "Duplicate" option.
- [Statusbar] "fd" and "FD" special format.
- [Statusbar] Add "PersonName" and "Student" options.

Fix
- [Statusbar] "Cellular" special format.
- Fixed conflict Shortcuts tweak.
- Fixed some issue.

- [All] Support iOS 9.
- [Shortcut] 3D Touch shortcut section.
- [Statusbar] "CellerIP" special format.
Mod
- [Preference] Change locked item switch color.
- [Preference] Don't indent while reordering.

Fix
- [Statusbar] Typo in document.
- [Preference] Support iTunesU.
- Couldn't load preference on iOS 4 and 5.
New
- [Preference] Reorder feature.

Fix
- [Preference] Various fixes.
New
- [Preferences] ThirdParty Apps option.

Mod
- [Preferences] SSH Connect and Bluetooth preferences are added to no-configurable list to avoid crash.
- [Preferences] Cloaked Prefs icon.
- Preference icons.

Fix
- [All] Couldn't immediately take effect settings change with iOS 8 cfprefsd.
- [Preferences] Apple Pay, iBooks and Podcast preferences are not configurable.
- [Preferences] Fixed iPhone 6 Plus get back preferences when rotated.
- Supported iOS 8.
- [Statusbar] Added small font/icon size style option.
- [ControlCenter] Fixed Vertex conflict issue.
- [Preference] Added 'Cloaked Prefs' option.
- [Preference] Fixed library load order issue.
Remove IPC code for verification

Fixed feature disabled on apps.

Fixed almost apps crash when launch bug.

Fix
- Category method name conflict.(e.g. Evernote)

Fix
[Statusbar] global Enabled behavior.
[Statusbar] Some settings not load on apps.
App crash issue when launch.

- New
[NotificationCenter] Newly added.
- Mod
[Statusbar] global Enabled option.
[Statusbar] Date format prefered OS native if not set for Cloaky.
NEW
- [Preferences] Enabled option.

MOD
- [Statusbar] PostNotification architecture.

NEW
- [Preference] Group option.

FIX
- [Menu] detect disabled item.
Mod
-[Activity] remove AppStore's gift option, it can hide as detected item.
-[Preference] support Carrier and Developer option.
-[Statusbar] NotCharging option show only iPad.

Fix
-[Activity, Menu] logged item override issue..
- NEW [Preferences] New section!

- NEW [Statusbar] NotCharging option.
- MOD [Statusbar] Add more format to document.
- FIX [Activity, Menu] Detected item couldn't dynamic change.
- FIX [Statusbar] SSID quote issue.

- NEW: [ControlCenter] AirStuff conditioner.
- MOD: Internal code for more efficiently.

- NEW: [Statusbar] Remove battery percent option.
- FIX: [ControlCenter] 'Music app is ready' behavior.
- FIX: [Activity] crash if poorly app's activity.
- FIX: [ControlCenter] iPhone landscape layout.

- NEW: [ControlCenter] MediaControls show while playing option.
- NEW: [Statusbar] IP2/3/4 special format.
- NEW: [Statusbar] SSID special format.
- NEW: [Statusbar] fm special format.
- MOD: [ControlCenter] Compatible CCLoader addons.
- MOD: [Statusbar] Ondemand IPAddress/SSID appear.
- FIX: Improve stability.
- FIX: Various bug fix.
